pageTitle: Olcay Gulsen Silk Georgette Jumpsuit | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Inseam: 30in / 76cm MEASUREMENTS Made in New York. Dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk georgette. A pleated shawl collar frames the neckline of a silk jumpsuit by Olcay Gulsen, styled with 4 pockets. Belt loops sit at the waist, and an inverted pleat details the back. A hidden zip closes the side, and covered buttons fasten the cuffs. Long sleeves. Sheer bodice and lined pants. Description What's New > Designer Boutique > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Olcay Gulsen's line of classic women's footwear and apparel are designed to turn heads on the red carpet and have been seen on Hollywood's hottest such as Emmy Rossum, Sophia Bush, and Kristin Cavallari. Launched in 2011, the label offers timeless silhouettes and luxe finishes made exclusively for the confident, fabulous woman who knows her own style. Gulsen's eponymous collection takes inspiration from her travels, including New York, London, and her hometown of Amsterdam. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all
